summary: The body of a schoolgirl is found in a meadow. The murderer is never caught, and years later; a young man named Stefano returns to the island and is reunited with his brother, the local priest.
cast: Lino Capolicchio|Stefania Casini|Craig Hill|Massimo Serato|Juliette Mayniel|Laura Nucci|Attilio Duse|Gianfranco Bullo|Luigi Casellato|Alfredo Zammi|Alina De Simone|Emilio Delle Piane|Sonia Viviani|Sergio Mioni|Fortunato Arena|Antonio Bido|Eolo Capritti
title: Sombra sangrienta
